description.full: Try the Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 demo to see what the forums and press are raving about. Experience astonishingly high realism and freedom thanks to unprecedented levels of control. Just like the real game, you'll find it difficult to master but also totally rewarding.
description.short: Try the Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 demo to see what the forums and press are raving about. Experience astonishingly high realism and freedom thanks to unprecedented levels of control. Just like the real game, you'll find it difficult to master but also totally rewarding.
